DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to determine the importance of the UV intensity and the UVB dose on the Vitamin D response after UVB.
DOC.detailed_description: The work is addressing vitamin D production after UVB exposure and explore the importance of UVB dose and UV intensity. Four different UVB doses and four different UV intensities are used to explore these relationships. Many assumptions have been made concerning the vitamin D production after UVB exposure but only few studies exist.
DOC.criteria: 1865 years Healthy Sun bed use Holiday or business travel south of 45 degrees latitude during trial Illness Drug addiction Pregnancy Lactating
